review_data.title: Nice sushi, freshly made, but no "wow"-factor
review_data.content: One of my go-to restaurants for sushi. Freshly made, really nice. Quite standard selection, but nicely made. Take-out selection is a bit limites, unless you order fresh sushi. Running sushi is usually very expensive though.

review_data.title: Anytime for Sushi
review_data.content: Very friendly staff and always a warm welcome for us. As we live close to this place we are often there for a quick stop. Quality of service and food is always very satosfying! :)
